com.seclass.snappat.app

类 ActivityUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.seclass.snappat.app.ActivityUtils

  • public class ActivityUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class ActivityUtils manage activity switch.

    Activity switch will call the function in this class

    Implement switch to next activity with some animation

    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
    作者:
    Sen Wang

    • 构造器概要

      ActivityUtils()
